Oppenheimer

Rank: 860


A dramatization of the life story of J. Robert Oppenheimer- the physicist who had a large hand in the development of the atomic bombs that brought an end to World War II.


Director: Christopher Nolan

Writer: Christopher Nolan, Kai Bird, Martin Sherwin

Stars: Cillian Murphy, Emily Blunt, Matt Damon

Tags: Docudrama, Epic, Historical Epic, Period Drama, Psychological Drama, Biography, Drama, History
